== Xubuntu 14.04 Beta 1 ==

=== New features, applications and packages ===
* Light Locker replaces xscreensaver for screen locking
* Light Locker Settings for controlling Light Locker and screensaver preferences
* Mugshot for editing personal preferences
* MenuLibre (2.0.1) for editing menus, replacing Alacarte
* Community wallpapers package

=== Important bug fixes and enhancements ===
* The panel now supports GTK3 indicators and uses Whiskermenu as the default menu along with a new single-panel layout
* Improved documentation which is also updated to match new applications and application versions
* Updated themes to work with the latest GTK3 version
* Many icon theme fixes

=== New application versions ===
* gmusicbrowser 1.11.1, bringing in a lot of bug fixes and new features
* Catfish 1.0.0
* Parole (0.6) ported to Gtk3 and gstreamer 1.0
* Xfwm4 (4.11) brings a new accessibility feature: zoom into your desktop using Alt+Scrollwheel
* Xfdesktop (4.11) bringing some cool new features, such as:
** invidual wallpapers for each workspace
** a chronological option which will sort the available wallpaper pictures according to their filename and then goes through them in their sort order and spread them equally over one day;
** an option to enable tooltips, which will appear when hovering over icons on the desktop with the mouse.

=== Other changes ===
* The image viewer and organizer gThumb is dropped, Ristretto is still included for photo viewing

=== Known issues ===
As with any software and software collection, Xubuntu has some bugs and issues. These include:
* xfdesktop crashes after logging in to the desktop (Bug:1282509)
* Thunar doesn't automatically mount removable devices and media (Bug:1210898)
* Network shares aren't shown on the desktop (Bug:1284914)
* Both xscreensaver and light-locker are active; when recovering from suspend, one needs to enter password twice to unlock (Bug:1284918)
* Wallpaper dialogue empty (Bug:1271713)
* After adding a user with the users-admin, it crashes (Bug:1185396)
* Ubuntu Software Centre sometimes crashes when trying to install new software (Bug:1196625)
* When using the British keyboard layout, the layout changes automatically after login (Bug:1284635)
* Debian wallpaper shown during Try or Install screen (Bug:1284910)
* Abiword's top ruler is not visible on first launch (Bug:1261203)
